subject: Re: nroff errors in 3.0.35a version of smb.conf.5
body:
On Jun 4, 2007, at 3:08 PM, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:

> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
> James Peach wrote:
>> On Jun 4, 2007, at 12:52 PM, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>>
>>> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
>>> Hash: SHA1
>>>
>>> James Peach wrote:
>>>> Hi Jerry,
>>>>
>>>> Did you change your DocBook build system for the 3.0.25a
>>>> release?
>>>
>>> The server was upgraded from Ubuntu Edgy to Feisty.
>>
>> There must be something different/broken about that docBook
>> install. smb.conf(5) shows XML entities when viewed with
>> man(1) on my Ubuntu 6.10 system as well.
>>
>> Any idea how to track this down?
>
> Nope.  I generally defer to Alexander or Jelmer on Docbook
> issues.  Maybe they have an idea.

I'd appreciate any advice on this one, guys. I notice that backslashes  
are not being escaped properly either :(

--
James Peach | jpeach@samba.org
